impressionist0.2
Impressionist is a visual authoring tool to build presentations using impress.js framework.
If you are not familiar writing HTML / CSS code, worry not! With WSIWYG slide authoring tools and an incredibly easy to use orchestration editor, impressionist makes creating impress.js presentations extremely easy and fun.

The hosted version of impressionist is free perpetually and the source code is opensourced at github, if you want to host it on your own.

Impressionist is created by Harish Sivaramakrishnan (@harish_io) and impress.js is created by Bartek Szopka (@bartaz)
